Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Paulina
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Ashland, Morse, Clark, and Lunt due to, street blockage near Lunt/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Ashland, Morse, Clark, and Lunt due to, street blockage near Lunt/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: CTA Bus Tracker May Be Temporarily Unavailable
ShortDescription: Info in CTA Bus Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to a network issue.  Engineers working to correct.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Info in CTA Bus Tracker may be temporarily unavailable due to a network issue.  Engineers working to correct.

Engineers are working to correct the problem and we appreciate your patience.

Service is unaffected.
